snippet: An exhibition of Rotimi Fani-Kayode’s work at the Walther Collection Project Space highlights the accomplishments of an artist who made breakthroughs before his death at 34.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews works by Rotimi Fani-Kayode at the Walther Collection Project Space.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition of Rotimi Fani-Kayode’s work at the Walther Collection Project Space highlights the accomplishments of an artist who made breakthroughs before his death at 34.
